abstract: JPMorgan Chase said on Wednesday it had hired former Goldman Sachs  banker Oral Dawe as managing director and chief executive of its Asia Pacific Commodities group.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase said on Wednesday it had hired former Goldman Sachs  banker Oral Dawe as managing director and chief executive of its Asia Pacific Commodities group.

headline.main: JPMorgan Hires Former Goldman Banker for Asia Post
